file_content.text: Republic butchers! You've invaded a sovereign Imperial world! Slaughtered dozens of innocents to, what, steal our research?
This facility is on a mission of peace. We're charting the Maelstrom Nebula for the good of all.
Surrender the technology you're using to navigate the nebula, and you won't be harmed.
Hand over the Gree computer.
Like the other personnel you spared? I'm no fool.
You have warships in orbit and battalions on the surface. If this is your version of a peace mission... you're doing it wrong.
Explain the military forces.
We knew once you discovered our research you'd attempt to steal it--and here you are!
Spare me your lies. The Empire has a prison inside the Maelstrom Nebula. A Jedi Master is held captive there.
You're guarding a prison.
I have nothing to do with that--and the Empire has every right to imprison anyone who threatens its security.
When the rest of the galaxy hears of this unprovoked assault, the Republic's evil will finally be exposed.
Your names will become synonymous with your government's extermination campaign against us.
It will surprise no one when the Jedi are revealed as warmongers. All you've ever sought is my culture's extermination!
Your Empire started this war. Before that, it was the Sith who tried to enslave the Jedi.
You confuse us with the Sith.
We take no pleasure in killing, but we do what we must to protect the Republic.
Spare me your platitudes. I see you for what you are: a murderer.
We are the guardians of peace and justice in the galaxy--but there can be no peace without justice.
Jedi seek only peace.
Your Empire oppresses, enslaves and murders all who don't submit. I cannot permit that to continue.
We've only ever defended ourselves. It's you who oppress us.
What are they paying you to exterminate us? What price was your conscience worth?
If we give your Empire the chance, you'll wipe us out. Destroy whole worlds and enslave the rest.
I'm protecting my people.
If I can save the Republic by killing you people, so be it. I won't shed any tears.
Think you're a hero, don't you? All I see is a murderer.
I don't know who you are, but I know what you serve--a campaign to eradicate the Empire.
I'm keeping the galaxy safe for independent entrepreneurs. No offense, but the Republic made me the better offer.
This is just business, pal.
Tell yourself whatever you want. You're nothing but mercenary scum.
Save your accusations. Gree technology isn't easy to come by. Where did the Empire find it?
How did you get the computer?
Darth Malgus obtained the computer during an expedition to the Outer Rim. I don't know more than that--and I don't care.
I won't even dignify that with a response. I want to hear everything you know about the nebula.
Tell me about the Maelstrom.
It's a massive expanse of cosmic dust and highly charged energy particles. Ship sensors are useless beyond a few kilometers.
You're condemning hundreds of civilian science vessels exploring the Maelstrom Nebula. Electromagnetic radiation alters the safe navigation routes every moment.
Without precise and timely coordinates from the Gree computer, thousands of good people--innocent scientists--will be trapped there forever.
The Republic doesn't leave civilians to die. Transmit fresh coordinates to your science vessels and order them home. Then, the computer's ours.
Call back your civilians now.
But our research! All that dangerous exploration will have been for nothing without a complete map....
Transmitting the coordinates now. The computer is yours. I hope it breaks the first time you use it.
There are no good or innocent people in the Empire. Your scientist friends work for the Emperor, just like you.
Imperials die. I'm happy.
Those crews don't have supplies to last more than a few weeks. They'll starve to death.
I won't let you kill them.
You can't stop what's happening--but you can run away.
Don't be a fool. Just leave.
I... I... Emperor forgive me....
You should've taken "no" for an answer.
Idiot. [Kill Doctor Narem]
Aaaaah!
...come in, repeat, come in! My fleet's taking heavy losses, and the fortress defenses are crumbling. There's no more time!
Take the computer to the fortress shuttle bay! You can fly out in one of their ships. We'll rendezvous in Republic space. Now go!
You people are nothing but thieves and butchers!
Idiot. [Kill Doctor Narem]
